source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Twisted Appendage

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 699,886.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Prideful Gladiator's Satin Gloves

spells.description: Use: Become the pinnacle of Gallagio service excellence and dole out Kaja'Cola Mega-Lite to injured allies 10 times over 4 sec, healing them for 1.4 million and increasing their Speed by 2,608 for 5 sec. The number of servings is increased by your Haste. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 135,739 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,613 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
T'uure, Beacon of the Naaru

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
